9.21.19  5:06 pm   How do I ensure i'll always be able to write ideas down?

Â Â Â Â Â  just use whatever devices you have. and if there is any circumstance where you absolutely cannot reach any writing device, let a talk show play out in your mind, discussing the idea from a variety of angles

9.21.19  2:10 pm   How are we going to watch your 3D videos? The YouTube 3D option?

Â Â Â Â Â  i may do some things for makeshift platforms like cardboard, or maybe even the VR platforms, but that would mostly be just tests in preparation for a future time when actual stereoscopic viewing is mainstream. until then, count on seeing good old fashioned 3D looking content, on a 2D screen

9.21.19  1:56 pm   Why are you bullshitting most of your answers? Is it because it is funny, or because it saves the time of thinking of a serious answer?

Â Â Â Â Â  sometimes i wonder why people are bullshitting most of the questions, but in either case, i know why, it's to distract from the all the ones that are incredibly extremely insanely serious

9.20.19  10:41 pm   why did all the keyboard people make it such a pain in the ass to have a separate command keyboard

Â Â Â Â Â  honestly i don't think anyone deliberately made it difficult, it's just that i think most people are less of a keyboard fiend than you might have expected. as it turns out, what is actually more difficult than any of this is making software and hardware and making enough of it fast enough to sell enough to be able to afford doing it

Â Â Â Â Â  that is only a problem at the very beginning. i am accustomed to playing instruments and instrument setups with a lot of controls. in due time it syncs in naturally
